Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.market

Class Market

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.market.Market
All Implemented Interfaces:
MarketView, java.io.Serializable
public class Market
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable, MarketView
Market is the market of Game.
See Also:
Serialized Form

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    Market()
    the constructor build a matrix 3X4 of marbles and a slot for the side slide.

  • Constructor Details

    • Market

      public Market()
      the constructor build a matrix 3X4 of marbles and a slot for the side slide. the market is build randomly with the amount of marbles available.

  • Method Details

    • getColumnMarbles

      public Marble[] getColumnMarbles​(int selectedColumn)
      Parameters:
      selectedColumn - this is the column where the caller wants all the marbles.
      Returns:
      a vector of Marble. this method allows the caller to get all the marbles inside a selected column.

    • getRowMarbles

      public Marble[] getRowMarbles​(int selectedRow)
      Parameters:
      selectedRow - this is the row where the caller wants all the marbles.
      Returns:
      a vector of Marbles. this method allows the caller to get all the marbles inside a selected row.

    • getExternalMarble

      public Marble getExternalMarble()
      Specified by:
      getExternalMarble in interface MarketView
      Returns:
      the external marble.

    • slideColumn

      public void slideColumn​(int selectedColumn)
      Specified by:
      slideColumn in interface MarketView
      Parameters:
      selectedColumn - number of column that will be slided. this method allows the caller to slide the selected column(of the market)of one position upwards, the last marble of the column gets out of the matrix and will placed to the side slide, the current element on the side slide gets placed to the first slot of the column.

    • slideRow

      public void slideRow​(int selectedRow)
      Specified by:
      slideRow in interface MarketView
      Parameters:
      selectedRow - number of the row that will be slided. this method allows the caller to slide the selected row of the market of one position to the left, the first marble of the column gets out of the matrix and will placed to the side slide, the current element in the side slide gets placed to the last slot of the row.

    • printMarketCli

      public void printMarketCli()
      print Market in CLI mode with ASCII art.
      Specified by:
      printMarketCli in interface MarketView

    • printRow

      public void printRow​(int row)
      Specified by:
      printRow in interface MarketView
      Parameters:
      row - is a row of the market. print a Market row in CLI mode with ASCII art.

    • printColumn

      public void printColumn​(int column)
      Specified by:
      printColumn in interface MarketView
      Parameters:
      column - is a row of the market. print a Market column in CLI mode with ASCII art.

    • printMarbles

      public void printMarbles​(java.util.ArrayList<Marble> marbles)
      Specified by:
      printMarbles in interface MarketView
      Parameters:
      marbles - are player's chosen marbles. print marbles as a Market row.

    • getMarble

      public Marble getMarble​(int row, int column)
      Specified by:
      getMarble in interface MarketView
